recipe.title: Tuna Rice Bake
recipe.ingredient: 1 425 gms tuna in olive oil drained
recipe.step: Put curry powder and stock cubes in boiling water and stir until dissolved. Place all ingredients in a baking dish except cheese and stir to combine then smooth top. Cover with grated cheese and place in preheated moderate (180D) oven for 20-30 minutes. Serve with salad if desired. Quick and super easy!
